string.name: card_browser
string.comment: The usage of card browser inside the app (note the casing)

string.name: undo_action_whiteboard_last_stroke
string.comment: One of the display patterns of \'Undo\' item on the action menu in Reviewer. It is shown as the title of the item when the whiteboard (handwriting) feature is enabled and visible and has any strokes (handwritten lines)

string.name: edit_deck_description
string.comment: edit the deck description

string.name: menu_add
string.comment: A generic add button. Please inform us if you need more specific strings

string.name: menu_my_account
string.comment: Label of the window in which the user should enter their account. This text can\'t be found in AnkiDroid directly.

resources.string: Та үнэхээр энэ картыг, хэсгүүдтэй нь цуг устгамаар байна уу?\n%s
Анкидройдын файлуудын чиглэсэн чиглэл ашиглах боломжгүй байна
Анкидройдод \"Storage\" ашиглах эрхийг өгч байж үргэлжлүүлэн ашиглаж болно.
Аль хэдийн эхлүүлсэн \"Тусгай судлах хэсэг\"-ийнхээ нэрээ эхэлж өөрчилнө үү

string.name: search_deck
string.comment: Deck search for selecting it

string.name: search_for_download_deck
string.comment: Deck search value for downloading deck

resources.string: Congratulations! You have finished for now.
Одоохондоо сурах, давтах карт алга байна

string.name: button_sync
string.comment: Text of the sync button

string.name: button_upgrade
string.comment: Text of the sync button

resources.string: Та зэрэгцүүлэлтийг цуцлахдаа итгэлтэй байна уу?
Цуцалж байна…\n Бага зэрэг удаж магадгүй
дор хаяж нэг картны төрөл шаардлагатай

plurals.name: card_template_editor_confirm_add
plurals.item: Энэ үйлдэл нь %1$d ширхэг картыг үүсгэнэ, үргэлжлүүлэх үү?

plurals.name: card_template_editor_confirm_delete
plurals.item: “%2$s\" энэ төрлийн картыг, мөн үүний %1$d картыг устгах уу?
“%2$s\" энэ төрлийн картыг, мөн үүний %1$d картыг устгах уу?

resources.string: Энэ картын төрлийн хасах нь нэг болон түүнээс олон картны хэсгүүдийг устгана. Эхлээд шинэ картны төрөл үүсгэнэ үү.
Картны загварын өөрчлөлтүүдийг хадгалах боломжгүй байна:%s
Энэ картны төрөл нь устгагдсан байна
Read and write to the AnkiDroid database
оршин буй тэмдэглэлүүд, картууд, тэмдэглэлүүдийн загварууд, болон багцуудыг ашиглах мөн шинийг бүтээх

string.name: card_browser_context_menu
string.comment: The value which appears in the system context menu. Note the casing difference

resources.string: Таны том цуглуулгуудыг нэгтгэх боломжгүй байна.\nТа аль том цуглуулгийг нь хадгалж үлдэх вэ?

string.name: sync_conflict_keep_local_new
string.comment: Select AnkiDroid files to keep while syncing

string.name: sync_conflict_keep_remote_new
string.comment: Select AnkiWeb files to keep while syncing

resources.string: Утсан дээрх Анкигийн том цуглуулгаа, интэрнэт дэх Анки цуглуулгаараа солих уу?
Интэрнэт дэх дээрх Анкигийн том цуглуулгаа, утсан дах Анки цуглуулгаараа солих уу?
%s файлыг бүтээх эсвэл өөрчлөх боломжгүй байна

string.name: error__etc__multiple_errors_most_recent
string.comment: Generic message for an error that has multiple causes, e.g., “Multiple errors, most recent: CPU hit by a cosmic ray particle”.

string.name: error__etc__multiple_consecutive_errors_without_progress_most_recent
string.comment: Generic message for an error that has multiple causes that happened in sequence, e.g., “Multiple consecutive errors without progress, most recent: CPU hit by a cosmic ray particle”.

resources.string: Олон үр дүнгүй давхардсан алдаа гаргалаа, хамгийн сүүлийнх нь: %s

string.name: migration__migrating_database_files
string.comment: Notification title that is shown when copying essential database files. As this is shown on the same line as the notification message, prefer shorter text.

string.name: migration__copying
string.comment: Notification message that is shown when copying essential database files. As this is shown on the same line as the notification title, prefer shorter text.

string.name: migration__migrating_media
string.comment: Notification title that is shown when migrating media files. As this is shown on the same line as the notification message, prefer shorter text.

string.name: migration__calculating_transfer_size
string.comment: Notification message that is shown when calculating the total size of media files to move. As this is shown on the same line as the notification title, prefer shorter text.

string.name: migration__moved_x_of_y
string.comment: Notification message that is shown when moving media files. As this is shown on the same line as the notification title, prefer shorter text. The placeholders will be replaced with short localized byte amounts, e.g. Moved 10 kB of 5.2 MB

string.name: migration_successful_message
string.comment: A title for a dialog, or a short message shown in a notification, when storage migration succeeds

string.name: migration__succeeded__message
string.comment: A more detailed message shown when storage migration succeeds

resources.string: Таны мэдээлэл амжилттай шилжлээ. AnkiDroid нь одоо зүгээр ажиллах ба, та одоо дахин зэрэгцүүлж болно. \n \nСануулахад, таны цуглуулгын байгаа Folder буюу хавтас нь таныг энэ Аппыг устгахад устгагдана. Та мэдээллээ устгагдахаас сэргийлж, ойр ойрхон мэдээллүүдээ зэрэгцүүлэх, эсвэл мэдээллүүдээ нөөцлөнө үү.

string.name: migration__failed__title
string.comment: A title for a dialog, or a short message shown in a notification, when storage migration fails

string.name: migration__failed__changes_rolled_back__message
string.comment: A more detailed message shown when storage migration fails, with the changes rolled back

resources.string:
Copying database files failed with the error: %1$s.

The changes were reverted.

Please try re-running the migration. To resolve the problem, you may need to free up some disk space, or reconnect the removable storage that holds your collection.

Learn more and get help

string.name: migration__failed__changes_not_rolled_back__message
string.comment: A more detailed message shown when storage migration fails, with the changes not rolled back

resources.string:
Moving media files is paused after having failed with the error: %1$s.

The changes were not reverted. While no data should’ve been lost, the media files might be split between the old and the new folder.

Please try re-running the migration. To resolve the problem, you may need to free up some disk space, or reconnect the removable storage that holds your collection.

Learn more and get help

Мэдээлэл шилжүүлэх үйл явц дараах шалтгааны улмаас түр зогслоо: %1$s.

энэ линкээр илүү мэдээлэл авна уу

string.name: directory_inaccessible_after_uninstall
string.comment: Dialog title if AnkiDroid can\'t access the collection once the app is installed

string.name: directory_inaccessible_after_uninstall_summary
string.comment: the parameter is the path to the AnkiDroid folder. Typically /storage/emulated/0/AnkiDroid

resources.string:
Play Store - ын Ашиглалтын Журамд өөрчлөлт орсны улмаас, таны цуглуулгыг, AnkiDroid - ыг устгасны дараа ашиглах боломжгүй. 

 Таны мэдээлэл аюулгүй ба дахин сэргээж болно. Тэгэхийн тулд та 
%s

 - дээр очоод доор "to restore" гэх сонголтыг нь дарахад болно:

string.name: directory_revoked_after_inactivity
string.comment: the first parameter is WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE the second parameter is the path to the AnkiDroid folder. Typically /storage/emulated/0/AnkiDroid

resources.string:
Android has removed AnkiDroid's %1$s permission due to app inactivity.

Your data is safe and can be restored. It is located at
%2$s

Select an option below to restore:
Таны утаснаас энэ Апп устгагдвал, энэ шинэ цуглуулга бүр мөсөн устгагдахыг анхаарна уу
AnkiDroid needs some permissions to work
Saves your collection in a safe place that will not be deleted if the app is uninstalled

string.name: all_files_access_title
string.comment: Name of the “All files access” permission from Android 10 and after
